TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 选定项存储在控件中 。A stores the selected items in a control. 中存储的项 是包含在中的项 。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 存储中显示的所有项 。The stores all items displayed in the . 下表显示了一个示例，说明如何 在示例控件中存储的项以及其选择状态 。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|ItemItem|ListView 中的选择状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|选定Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Tuple.item4Item4|选定Selected| |44|Tuple.item5Item5|选定Selected| 根据 上表中的示例，下表演示了 将如何显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中的选定项Selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-------------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Tuple.item4Item4| |22|Tuple.item5Item5| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 使用 方法可以确定类中的项是否为的 成员 。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定项在中的位置 。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、 事件和 成员以及 类。The following code example demonstrates using the , event, and members and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 名为的对象 `ListView1` 和 名为的的窗体中 `TextBox1` 。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or the event handler. 此示例要求正确与事件关联的事件处理程序 This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于中的的键 。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数为 `null` 或空字符串，则 返回 `false` 。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将多个集合中的选定项组合到一个数组中。You can use this method to combine the selected items from multiple collections into a single array.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定控件中选定项的数目 。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the control. 然后，可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并且需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非将 的属性 设置为，否则 `true` 此属性始终返回值为零 (0) 或 (1) ，具体取决于是否具有选定的项。Unless the property of the is set to `true`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于中的的键 。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数为 `null` 或空字符串，则 返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果 连续调用，最后返回的索引将首先检查键匹配项，如果没有匹配项，则从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
